Item ID1601

A Diamond is a white gem used in Crafting and Fletching. Diamonds can be cut from uncut diamonds with level 43 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 107.5 experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make diamond jewellery.

One diamond is required to enter the Zanaris marketplace.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Diamonds can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a gold bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
43 Uncut diamond 2,866 Diamond 1,838 −1,028 107.5 311,750 −9.56
43 Diamond Gold bar 1,923 Diamond ring 1,917 −6 85 106,250 −0.07
56 Diamond Gold bar 1,923 Diamond necklace 1,998 75 90 112,500 0.83
58 Diamond Gold bar 1,923 Diamond bracelet 2,003 80 95 118,750 0.84
70 Diamond Gold bar 1,923 Diamond amulet (u) 1,950 27 100 125,000 0.27
1 Diamond amulet (u) Ball of wool 1,986 Diamond amulet 2,027 41 4 8,000 10.25
  1. ^ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Diamond jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-4 Enchant, requiring level 57 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 10 Earth runes, and the piece of Diamond Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Diamond ring 1,917 2,031 Ring of life 1,866 −165 67 107,200 −2.46
Diamond necklace 1,998 2,112 Phoenix necklace 2,213 101 67 107,200 1.51
Diamond bracelet 2,003 2,117 Abyssal bracelet 2,208 91 67 107,200 1.36
Diamond amulet 2,027 2,141 Amulet of power 2,092 −49 67 107,200 −0.73
  1. ^ Cost calculated using a Staff of earth (provides unlimited Earth runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.

Combined[edit | edit source]

Requires 57 Magic; for XP rates and Crafting requirements, see above tables. Assumes a Staff of Earth is wielded for enchantment.

Materials Material cost Product Product value Profit

Diamond Gold bar Cosmic rune 2,037 Phoenix necklace 2,213 176
Diamond Gold bar Cosmic rune 2,037 Abyssal bracelet 2,208 171
Diamond Gold bar Cosmic rune Ball of wool 2,073 Amulet of power 2,092 19

Other[edit | edit source]

Cut Diamonds can also be used to make the following items:

  • Diamond bolt tips, which require level 65 Fletching and yield 7 experience per gem.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Gems available on free-to-play worlds can no longer be crushed with a hammer to receive a members object (crushed gem).
